foreignData.name: Das Schicksal vermeiden
foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Spontanzauber oder eine Aura deiner Wahl, der bzw. die eine bleibende Karte, die du kontrollierst, als Ziel hat.

foreignData.name: Evitar el destino
foreignData.text: Contrarresta el hechizo instantáneo o de aura que hace objetivo a un permanente que controlas.

foreignData.name: Esquive du destin
foreignData.text: Contrecarrez le sort d'éphémère ou d'aura ciblé qui cible un permanent que vous contrôlez.

foreignData.name: Sfuggire al Destino
foreignData.text: Neutralizza una magia istantaneo o Aura che ha come bersaglio un permanente che controlli.

foreignData.name: 運命の回避
foreignData.text: あなたがコントロールするパーマネントを対象としているインスタント呪文１つかオーラ呪文1つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。

foreignData.name: Evitar o Destino
foreignData.text: Anule a mágica instantânea alvo ou a mágica de Aura alvo que tenha como alvo uma permanente que você controla.

foreignData.name: Избежать Судьбы
foreignData.text: Отмените целевое мгновенное заклинание или Чары, нацеленные на перманент под вашим контролем.

foreignData.name: 逃避宿命
foreignData.text: 反击目标瞬间或灵气咒语，且该咒语须以由你操控的永久物为目标。

name: Avoid Fate
originalText: Counter target instant or Aura spell that targets a permanent you control.

rulings.text: Avoid Fate must target an instant spell or an Aura spell as it’s cast, and it must be targeting an instant or an Aura spell at the time it resolves. It will still resolve if it starts out targeting a spell of one type but the target changes to a spell of the other type (thanks to Shunt, for instance) before it resolves.

text: Counter target instant or Aura spell that targets a permanent you control.
